intro:
Spot the Difference!
A quick and easy brain game where just one thing is out of place.
description:
This is a game where you have to find just one hidden mistake in a photo — before the timer runs out.

How to play is super simple：
・First, look closely at the top photo — this is your reference
・Then, check the bottom photo to spot what’s different
・Move the cursor over the spot and press “OK”!

With easy controls and quick rounds, it’s perfect for brain training or a quick break anytime.

Stuck? Tap the hint button — it’ll show you the general area where the difference is hiding!
